subject: Interscholastic Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mike Rosario scored 19 points as St. Anthony of Jersey City, the No. 1-ranked boys basketball team in the country, beat No. 9 St. Patrick of Elizabeth, 64-52, for the North Non-Public B championship in Piscataway, N.J. If St. Anthony (29-0) defeats Trenton Catholic on Saturday in the Non-Public B final in Toms River, it will set a national record with its 25th state title. The Friars are tied with Central High School of Cheyenne, Wyo., with 24.
